description: SharePoint Online Configuration, Request for Proposal
full_summary:
## SharePoint Online Configuration Tender Announcement

### Tender Details

| Field | Value |
| --- | --- |
| Solicitation Number | CIC20240001-001 |
| Publication Date | October 11, 2023 |
| Tender Closing Date | October 30, 2023 at 17:00:00 |
| Contracting Entity | Canada Innovation Corporation |
| Contracting Entity Address | 90 Elgin St., Ottawa, Ontario, Canada K1P 0C6 |

### Configuration Requirements

The Canada Innovation Corporation requires a SharePoint Online Configuration to support its operations. The successful bidder will be responsible for configuring and implementing the Sharepoint Online Platform to meet the Corporation's requirements.

### Key Requirements

* The bidder must have experience in configuring and implementing SharePoint Online.
* The bidder must be able to provide a detailed proposal outlining the proposed configuration.
* The bidder must be able to provide a comprehensive description of the configuration requirements.
* The bidder must be able to deliver the configuration on or before November 22, 2023.

### Procurement Information

* Procurement Category: SRV
* Procurement Method: Competitive Traditional
* Selection Criteria: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price
* Trade Agreements: North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Regions of Opportunity: National Capital Region (NCR)

### Amendment 1

An amendment to the original tender notice has been published, which can be found in the attachments section below.

### Tender Attachments

The tender notice and amendment can be downloaded from the following links:

* http://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/20445/cic_im_spo_rfp_2023-v2.pdf
* http://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/21869/rfp-amendment-no-1.pdf

### Contact Information

For any questions or clarifications regarding the tender notice, please contact Aline Frances at (343) 541-8208 or Aline.Francis@fin.gc.ca.

### Notice Website

The notice website is not available at this time. 

### Contact

For any questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to contact us.

Best regards. Let me know if you have any questions.
